roleset.name: engage in a battle with someone
roleset.note: STRUGGLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'struggle' based on financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet. Member of Vncls battle-36.4-1. Note that all of the examples here involve multiple strugglers. (from struggle.01-v)
STRUGGLE-N NOTES: Roleset baed on verb entry struggle.01. Corresponds to Vncls battle-36.4-1. (from struggle.01-n)
STRUGGLING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from struggling.01-n)

example.name: with co-struggler
example.text: Same store-sales for Kentucky Fried Chicken, which-1 *trace*-1 has struggled with increased competition in the fast-food chicken market and a lack of new products, rose only 1%.
example.arg: with increased competition in the fast-food chicken market and a lack of new products

example.name: merged strugglers
example.text: John and Mary struggled over the cause of his noxious foot odor.
example.arg: over the cause of his noxious foot odor

example.name: I can't believe this hasn't occurred yet
example.text: John struggled with Mary over the cause of his noxious foot odor.
example.arg: over the cause of his noxious foot odor

example.name: with prize
example.text: John struggled with Mary for the last piece of cake.
example.arg: for the last piece of cake

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Nevertheless, in his struggle against Beorhtric for the crown of Wessex , Egbert had two great disadvantages

roleset.name: try very hard
roleset.note: STRUGGLE-V NOTES: Nominal 'struggling' based on BOLT-7. (from struggle.02-v)
STRUGGLE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry struggle.02. (from struggle.02-n)
STRUGGLING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from struggling.02-n)

example.name: with difficult action
example.text: The results show Sears is struggling to attract shoppers.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Sears, Roebuck& Co. is struggling as it enters the critical Christmas season.
example.arg: as it enters the critical Christmas season

example.name: Nominal rel: struggling; no args
example.text: It is always the people that suffer . Poor Chinese people ! A century of struggling , bleeding , weeping , and sweating eventually reduced to nothing ...

example.name: All arguments
example.text: In the months before his death, Warren documented his struggle to fill both roles.
